(:action knit ; Create or construct a specified object
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - constructible ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (not (constructed ?item ?location)))
    :effect (and (constructed ?item ?location))

(:action wrap
    ; A universal action to check and wrap items
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?material - material)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (at ?actor ?item) (joined ?material))
    :effect (and (wrapped ?actor ?item ?material))
